entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:32 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -21.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 1:18 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -21.6°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 48 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -29.6°C

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 35 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
